info.name: Rebill API Demo
info.description:
Postman Echo is service you can use to test your REST clients and make sample API calls. It provides endpoints for `GET`, `POST`, `PUT`, various auth mechanisms and other utility endpoints.

The documentation for the endpoints as well as example responses can be found at [https://postman-echo.com](https://postman-echo.com/?source=echo-collection-app-onboarding)

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

item.name: Set or Update Role to User
Get all Cards by Customer ID
Get an Email Template by Id

body.raw:

Some stuff for {{userName}} Updated

" }

item.name: Get a Sales Unit by ID
Get a Payment by Gateway Payment Id

body.raw:
{
	"customer": {
		"firstName": "Nahuel",
		"lastName": "Candia",
		"email":"nahuel@rebill.to",
		"phone_areacode":"11",
		"phone_number":"66862583",
		"birthday":"03/22/1996",
		"region_id":1,
		"vat_type":"DNI",
		"vatID_number":38072739,
		"personalID_type":"DNI",
		"personalID_number":38072739,
		"address_street":"El Salvador",
		"address_number":5218,
		"address_floor":"-",
		"address_apt":"-",
		"address_city":"Buenos Aires",
		"address_province":"Buenos Aires",
		"address_zipcode":"1414",
		"description":"Cuenta Real",
		"vendor_id":1
	},
	"card": {
		"card_number": "4546 4000 6836 6884",
		"expiration_month": "04",
		"expiration_year": "2022",
		"security_code": "078",
		"cardholder": {
	        "name": "Denis Nahuel Candia",
	        "identification": {
	            "number": "38072739",
	            "type": "DNI"
	        }
	    }
	},
	"transaction": {
		"amount": 3,
		"description": "Subscription Description 01",
		"installments": 1,
		"external_reference": "05",
		"capture": true,
		"gateway": "mercadopago_ar",
		"subscription_id": 10
	}
}

	}
}
